text: [f there is no suitable index, then the txn must obtain: — A lock on every page in the table to prevent a record’s status='lit' from being changed to lit. — The lock for the table itself to prevent records with status='lit' from being added or deleted. — = | R EN G MLU i 89 @00 CMU Database Systems - 18 Timestamp Ordering Concurrency Control (Fall 2018)
